thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 9 of 472
thread.title: Deanna

author: Deanna
title: Deanna
text: My prints look great in these bags, and I love how they fold over and seal. The only thing is that I should have ordered the prints smaller. For example an 18 x 24 print fits in the bag just fine, but the print had a 1/2 inch white boarder around it which I had to cut off to fit them in the bag. I should have ordered the prints 17 x 23! Then I wouldn't have had to cut that boarder off. But the bags are wonderful!
